sections.label: Summary
sections.description: Provide a concise but informative name and description of your project. The name should clearly represent the project's purpose, while the description should offer more details, including its environmental goals and expected outcomes. Make sure the summary effectively conveys the essence of your project to users.

fields.name: presentation
fields.label: Add a presentation document to your project

sections.label: Schedule
sections.description: Specify the start date and estimated end date of your project. The start date marks the commencement of project activities, while the estimated end date should reflect when you anticipate the project will conclude.
